message.content: This question tests knowledge on the tools used to measure time in a race. Option (D) is the correct answer because a stopwatch is commonly used to measure the time it takes for a racer to reach the finish line. Option (A) is incorrect because a rabbit is not a tool used for measuring time. Option (B) and (C) are also incorrect because they are unrelated objects and tools that are not used for measuring time in a race.
